page.title: 12CHILDREN'S FASHION:ST.ALBANS
page.content: We have been working on a project about{"CHILDREN'S FASHION"}and have been asking shop-assistants about the fashion they sell.We also set up a questionaire for the girls from 7 to 11 in our school.We found that the most popular fabrics are polyester and cotton. Colours are bright, peach and cream being the most popular. Style is casual- baggy, not tight. { {Jeans}and{sweatshirts}are worn by both boys and girls.{Dresses}are striped, spotted, checked and plain.{Mix-and- {match}are{trousers, skirts}and{tops}in co-ordinating colours. We found that amongst the girls from 7 to 11{tight {skirts}are most popular.Most people wear simple, comfortable clothes. Boys and girls both wear{tracksuits}and {trousers}such as{baggys,three-quarter- {lengths }and {slacks.}
